channel.title: Hhhheeeellllpppp!
channel.description:
CAN SOMEONE PLEASE POST A TUT TO MAKE A NONSQL SERVER A SQL SERVER??
IF YOU HAVE A SQLSOURCE I'M VERYVERY HAPPY... i allready have sqlscape.......

item.title: Hhhheeeellllpppp!
item.dc:creator: @ko3n ko3n
item.description:
@ko3n wrote:

the changing from nosql to sql server is the only thing i dont know, but i want to learn it, thats why i posted this question. i know how to edit servers that are allready sql, and i know how to run it, i just want another source…

i hope someone can be a little more helpfull and give me a link of another source then sqlscape, or post a tut how to make a no sql server sql.

Read full topic

item.title: Hhhheeeellllpppp!
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

You’ll need to edit the functions that save/load player files to access a MySQL database. If you know MySQL, then you won’t need help learning how to use the connector in Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Hhhheeeellllpppp!
item.dc:creator: @speedy19921 speedy19921
item.description:
@speedy19921 wrote:

i know how to run, edit and host a sql server, i just dont know how to add sql to a normal server source… if anyone knows how to, please let me know…

item.title: Hhhheeeellllpppp!
item.dc:creator: @Cryptic_V Cryptic V
item.description:
@Cryptic_V wrote:

If you can’t comprehend how to make one SQL server work, what makes you think others will be easier?

SQL is out of your league, learn it first.
